availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Stewart (Trimble Co., KY, shoemaker)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Native of Scotland. Married to Jane Duncan Stewart in Trimble County on July 30, 1846. Father of Charles Stewart, Mary Stewart, Arabella Stewart, and Cora Stewart. Shoemaker in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Bedford, 65.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, p. 4-5.
Find A Grave, "John Williamson Stewart (1809-1885)," Memorial #35849545, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35849545 (accessed January 26, 2018).
